item.title: The #Talkpay Hashtag
item.description: Something interesting happened on twitter this week. The #Talkpay hastag went viral. This sparked a number of conversations I had with my peers. On the User Experience Design Slack channel we spent a good while talking about the idea, and it’s potential ramifications or benefits to the community. So, let’s #Talkpay.
